story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_0300_10:
I’ve decided to work with the International Police.
Looker will supervise my probation.
story_final_02_11000/2401_0401_0500_10: Yeah. I know it’s sudden, but...
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_0800_10:
That said, I’m not going to be officially affiliated
with them.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_0900_10:
Paulo’s learned a lot from all of those villainous
organizations.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1000_10:
I’d like him to make use of what he’s learned to
help us protect the weak and face evil.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1100_10:
I think it could also help you on your path towards
your ideals, Paulo.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1200_10:
Thank you, Looker. I’m sure it must’ve been difficult
to arrange that for me...
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1300_10:
Not at all! It’s a breeze for me to convince even
the most hardheaded bosses!
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Yeah, but you sure got a good earful when you
were on the phone with them!
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1500_10: H-hey, Emma! You didn’t have to mention that!
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1600_10:
Well...I guess we can’t take back what’s been
said. It was as you guessed, Paulo.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1700_10:
In this case, Nanu and I also stepped in to help
make this happen, and it wasn’t easy.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1800_10:
But that’s how much we want to support you and
your feelings, Paulo.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_1900_10:
I am aware this puts some pressure on you, but
I’m looking forward to working together.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2100_10: So this is where you were, Paulo.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2300_10: I...I need to apologize to both of you again. I—
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2400_10: Allow me to thank you for bringing Hoopa back.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2500_10: B-but that was all caused by my—
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2600_10: Even so, you saved Hoopa. Don’t worry about it.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2700_10: Or do you really think I’m THAT petty?
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_2900_10:
Furthermore, you also drew out Hoopa’s strength,
even if imperfectly.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_3000_10:
If you don’t use that skill of yours to its fullest here
on Pasio, it’ll be...inconvenient.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_3100_10: Thank you. I’ll do my best.
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_3200_10:
OK! Now that you know everyone’s cheering you
on, why don’t we do some training?
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_3400_10: Let’s do this—and have a fun Pokémon battle!
story_final_02_11000/2401_1201_3600_10: I wonder how my next scheme will turn out...
